summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via a new URL-hash guard and updated share-link control that copies PUBLIC_SITE_URL and warns against sharing admin-token links. REQ-3 cannot be confirmed from the provided DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md excerpt (content appears truncated before any admin-token/clean-URL verification step). Additionally, non-requested project/meta files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the deployment checklist documentation to include a verification step that the published/live visitor link contains no `#caffeineAdminToken` fragment and that the clean URL renders the app content.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md` is truncated and does not show the required checklist step(s) about verifying the clean URL (https://npt-for-sunidhi.caffeine.xyz with no hash) renders app content and that admin-token links should not be shared.
evidence: frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md (truncated in diff; no visible admin-token/clean-URL verification steps)

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of repository/project metadata/state file not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for frontend guard, share-link UX changes, and deployment checklist documentation updates; it does not request updating `project_state.json`.
